title: Mission-to-mission orchestration (sub-missions)
description: Allow a running mission to spawn child missions as sub-workers â€” like Claude's Task tool but at the AgenC level. A parent mission creates a child mission with a prompt, the child runs as a live interactive Claude session in the tmux pool (not linked to any window), and the parent can optionally wait for the result or fire-and-forget. Key pieces: (1) a 'detached' creation path in spawnWrapper that calls createPoolWindow but skips linkPoolWindow and doesn't require TmuxSession, (2) parent-child relationship tracking, (3) a way to get results back (poll status + read output). Related: agenc-qoj (inter-agent chat) which would be useful for parent-child communication.
